name: Lemniscatto
author: Alucard648
info: 2 enemies that move in infinity-like shape. Done on request by SkyFlare
description: LemniscattoMoves in valious shapes around it`s starting position, infinily-like by default, Firing eweapons every now and then.--Lemniscatto AltMoves in valious shapes around it`s starting position, infinily-like by default, Has eye that opens and closes. Shoots eweapons, when eye is open. Invincible, when eye is closed. Does not move when firing.
setup: LamniscattoAttribute 1: Maximum range at X coordinateAttribute 2: Maximum range at Y coordinateAttribute 3: Angular speed for X coordinateAttribute 4: Angular speed for Y coordinateAttribute 5: Starting angle for X coordinateAttribute 6: Starting angle for Y coordinateAttribute 7: Tile WidthAttribute 8: Tile HeightAttribute 9: Delay between shots, in frames. Enemy won`t fire , if Weapon Damage is 0.Attribute 10: Eweapon size LemniscattoAltAttribute 1: Maximum range at X coordinateAttribute 2: Maximum range at Y coordinateAttribute 3: Angular speed for X coordinateAttribute 4: Angular speed for Y coordinateAttribute 5: Starting angle for X coordinateAttribute 6: Starting angle for Y coordinateAttribute 7: Tile WidthAttribute 8: Tile HeightAttribute 9: Delay between eye opening/closing.Attribute 10: Eweapon size
